mapper.select: select file_name fileName, file_formart fileFormat, file_size fileSize, file_stream fileStream, file_uuid fileUuid from file_info where phone_no = #{phoneNo}
mapper.insert: insert into file_info (phone_no, file_name, file_formart, file_size, file_stream, file_uuid, create_time, modify_time) values (#{phoneNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileFormat}, #{fileSize}, #{fileStream}, #{fileUuid}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.update: update file_info set file_name = #{fileName}, file_formart = #{fileFormat}, file_size = #{fileSize}, file_stream = #{fileStream}, file_uuid = #{fileUuid}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} where phone_no = #{phoneNo}
mapper.select: select phone_no phoneNo, file_name fileName, file_formart fileFormat, file_size fileSize, file_stream fileStream from file_info where file_uuid = #{fileId}
